comment: I don't prefer her teaching that's all. Her meetings are useful and she makes sure that everybody understands the unit before moving on. But the quiz and test can throw people off. You do take two attempts but it's graded averaged not replaced by the highest score..
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Professor Bruney made this class very worthwhile. She tried her best to explain confusing STATS concepts so that a 3rd grader would understand it. There were 3 tests, 8 online quizzes, a sizeable chunk of ConnectMath hw and a final exam. She offered EC for taking a general assessment. I got a D (which is passing for non-major classes!)
